entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: NNE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
